title: (x) Redefining Comfortable Travel - Avenir {Chesh}
content:
This is the first time I have used this board. I came across the forums while looking for another font. So I decided to try this out to see if you guys can help. I am a designer and I am looking for this particular font, it is used on the [www.gulfstream.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123451/http:/www.gulfstream.com/) site. Please take a look at the image I have attached. The font is used in the navigation, and is the font used in the headline "Redefining Comfortable Travel.   
   
Thanks for your help! ![font image, "Redefiing Comfortable Travel"](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123451im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37459.jpg) [http://www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-post.pl?action=posting\_upload\_form&what=show&img=37454](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123451/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-post.pl?action=posting_upload_form&what=show&img=37454)
author: design_girl
